title: Remove Files from the Staging Area
description: In Git, the staging area is where changes to files are prepared before they are committed to the repository. Sometimes, you may accidentally add files to the staging area that you don't want to commit. In this lab, you will learn how to remove files from the staging area using Git.

meta.title: Git Playground | Remove Files from Staging Area
meta.description: Learn how to remove accidentally added files from the Git staging area and prepare your commits effectively.
